body_html:
There was an attempt to add this functionality in this PR #6185 by @llhe

Otherwise server stays open until the Python process quits.

In current situation you could implement this functionality by having a parent process running while loop and launching child Python processes which start the server
body_text:
There was an attempt to add this functionality in this PR #6185 by @llhe
Otherwise server stays open until the Python process quits.
In current situation you could implement this functionality by having a parent process running while loop and launching child Python processes which start the server
body:
There was an attempt to add this functionality in this PR https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/6185 by @llhe 

Otherwise server stays open until the Python process quits.

In current situation you could implement this functionality by having a parent process running `while` loop and launching child Python processes which start the server
